# Summary

Explain the change and the problem it solves.

## Type
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Fix
- [ ] Docs
- [ ] Chore
- [ ] Security

## Details
- Motivation / Context
- Implementation notes

## Security Considerations
- Data touched
- Secrets/key handling
- Potential attack surface changes

## Testing
- Steps to verify
- [ ] Added/updated tests

## Checklist
- [ ] Lint/format pass (Ruff/Black)
- [ ] Types pass (mypy)
- [ ] Docs updated
- [ ] No secrets
